name: find
description: Find (try to locate) in the scene the specified object, getting its position

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to find. For example, apple, fridge, TV, etc.

name: go_to
description: Move (navigate) to the specified object. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have previously found the specified object via the "find" action

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to go to. For example, apple, fridge, TV, etc.

name: pick_up
description: Pick up (grab) the specified object. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have previously gone to the specified object via the "go_to" action. The robot can only hold one object at a time, so if it is already holding an object, it must put it down before it can pick up a new object

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to pick up. For example, apple, mug, credit card, etc.

name: put_down_grasped_object_on
description: Put down the object that the robot is currently holding on the receptacle specified as argument. To be able to execute this action, the robot must be holding an object and have previously gone to the specified receptacle via the "go_to" action

parameters.receptacle: The receptacle that we want the robot to place the object on. For example, dining table, microwave, countertop, etc.

name: toggle
description: Toggle the specified object, switching it from its on/off states. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have previously either gone to the object (TV, light switch, etc.) or picked up the object (remote control, cell phone, etc.)

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to toggle. For example, remote control, TV, coffee machine, desk lamp, light switch, etc.

name: slice
description: Slice the specified object, cutting it into portions. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have first picked up a knife and then gone to the object to slice. Immediately after executing this action, the robot must put the knife down

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to slice. For example, bread, apple, tomato, etc.

name: open
description: Open the specified object. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have previously gone to the specified object via the "go_to" action. This action is needed to put items inside openable objects such as drawers, cabinets, fridges, microwaves, etc. Immediately after opening the specified object (and possibly picking up or putting something inside), the robot must close it

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to open. For example, fridge, drawer, cabinet, microwave, etc.

name: close
description: Close the specified object. To be able to execute this action, the robot must have previously gone to the specified object via the "go_to" action. The robot must close every object that is opens

parameters.object: The object that we want the robot to close. For example, fridge, drawer, cabinet, microwave, etc.

name: wait
description: Wait the number of specified seconds. This action is necessary to perform tasks such as making a coffee, washing an object, or microwaving something, since some time is required to pass for the previous action to produce the desired effect

parameters.seconds: The number of seconds that we want the robot to wait. For example, 15, 30, 60, etc.
